mapper.insert:
insert into production_info ( amazon_sku, erp_sku, asin, product_name, product_abbreviation, category_one, category_two, shop, product_owner, product_grade, sales_status, brand ) values
( #{item.amazonSku}, #{item.erpSku}, #{item.asin}, #{item.productName}, #{item.productAbbreviation}, #{item.categoryOne}, #{item.categoryTwo}, #{item.shop}, #{item.productOwner}, #{item.productGrade}, #{item.salesStatus}, #{item.brand} )
